name: AS_GSS_CPS_showWeightsWarningBanners
description: This is used to display the banners related to factor weight validation on weights step of an evaluation
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!weightValidationBannerList: rule!AS_GSS_VD_validateFactorWeights(
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    checkForBlankWeights: false()
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!weightValidationBannerList,
    expression: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_customisableBanner(
        primaryIcon: "exclamation-triangle",
        primaryIconColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
          brandingKey: "FactorWeightsValidationBannerIconColor",
          useSuiteBranding: true
        ),
        primaryTextColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
          brandingKey: "FactorWeightsValidationBannerTextColor",
          useSuiteBranding: true
        ),
        decorativeBarColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
          brandingKey: "FactorWeightsValidationBannerCardDecorativeBarColor",
          useSuiteBranding: true
        ),
        cardLayoutStyle: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
          brandingKey: "FactorWeightsValidationBannerCardStyle",
          useSuiteBranding: true
        ),
        primaryText: fv!item,
        showBorder: false(),
        marginBelow: "LESS"
      )
    }
  )
)
